SA03n801:1657: vihitalalitayatibhiḥ yā'pi abhiratiṃ janayati tadā niyatamamṛtadhārā bhavati |
SA03n801:1663: yadi pura eva pāde saḥ jaḥ saḥ laghuśca syuḥ,
SA03n801:1664: anantaramiti dvitīye naḥ saḥ jaḥ guruśca syuḥ,
SA03n801:1665: atheti tṛtīye bhaḥ naḥ jaḥ laḥ gaśca,
SA03n801:1666: atho iti caturthe saḥ jaḥ saḥ jaḥ gaḥ syuḥ tathā iyam udgatā |
SA03n801:1671: yatra tṛtīyād anyathāpādād itarad pādatrayam udgatā sadṛśmeva bhavati |
SA03n801:1673: kīdṛśa iti? ra na bha gurugrathito hi tṛtīyo'nyathā |
SA03n801:1678: yatra tṛtīyapāde nau sau ca syuḥ,
SA03n801:1683: pāde cet pratheme masau jabhau guruṇī ca
SA03n801:1687: yadi prathame pāde maḥ saḥ jaḥ bhaḥ guruṇī ca syuḥ,
SA03n801:1688: atha iti dvitīye saḥ naḥ jaḥ raḥ guruśca syuḥ,
SA03n801:1692: pāde syūryadi nau sanau nasau ca tṛtīye
SA03n801:1695: yadi tṛtīyapāde naḥ naḥ saḥ naḥ naḥ saśca syuḥ,
SA03n801:1706: yadi tasya tṛtīyapādaḥ pracupitagaṇasamaḥ syād tadā tacchuddhavirāḍviśeṣaṇaṃ ārṣabhābhidhānaṃ tacchuddhaviraḍārṣabhaṃ vṛttaṃ vadanti |
SA03n801:1710: na vyañjanena mātrā laghunaikā bhavati guruṇā dve ||1 ||
SA03n801:1716: tatra svaratrayātiriktaṃ āryā tu viṣamavṛttasadṛśī paradvayātiriktaṃ vaitālīyaṃ tu ardhasamavṛttasadṛśam |
SA03n801:1719: parantu ekena laghunā ekā mātrā syād,
SA03n801:1722: te cāḥ kho'pi caturlaḥ ka ekamātro dvimātro daḥ ||2 ||
SA03n801:1733: so'pi dvilaghuḥ athavā gurureva dvividho bhavati |
SA03n801:1734: viṣameṣu jarahitaśced dale dale'ṣṭau gaṇā bhavatyāryā |
SA03n801:1735: paścārdhe kaḥ ṣaṣṭho do'ṣṭama ubhayatra cāḥ śeṣāḥ ||3 ||
SA03n801:1739: tatra paścārddhe ṣaṣṭhagaṇamātrām ekīkṛtya ubhayārdhayorapi aṣṭamagaṇe mātrādvayaṃ,
SA03n801:1743: pūrvādhe ṣaṣṭho jaḥ kho vā khetvādyalaghuni bhavati yatiḥ |
SA03n801:1745: pūrvādhe ṣaṣṭho gaṇo jakāraḥ karaṇīyaḥ pūrvasūtravat |
SA03n801:1748: tadā tu tatprathame laghau yatiḥ karaṇīyā,
SA03n801:1749: yasya pūrvādhe'pi ṣaṣṭho gaṇaḥ khaparaḥ syād |
SA03n801:1754: caramadale tatpaścārdhe caturthagaṇo yadi khaparaḥ syāt |
SA03n801:1759: ata eva pūrvādhe ṣaṣṭhaḥ kha eva,
SA03n801:1766: caistribhirayugmapādau yadā samāptau tadā bhavet pathyā |
SA03n801:1767: eko'pi niṣṭhito na yadi tairayugmastadā vipulā ||5 ||
SA03n801:1771: yadā tricakāraiḥ ayugmaḥ eko'pi pādo na niṣṭhitaḥ,
SA03n801:1778: tādṛśayoḥ madhye gurudvayaṃ vidyamānaṃ ardhadvaye bhavetā tadā āryā sarvataścapalā |
SA03n801:1779: pūrvādha eva cet kevale bhavellakṣaṇaṃ tu capalāpāḥ |
SA03n801:1780: na syāt punaraparārdhe mukhacapalāsau tadā bhavati ||7 ||
SA03n801:1782: gurū ca madhyasthitau tadyadi pūrvārdha eva syāt na tu aparārdhe tadā āryā mukhacapalā |
SA03n801:1785: āryāyāṃ yatra pūrvārdhaṃ vihāya paścārdhe kevale capalālakṣaṇam pūrvoktam,
SA03n801:1787: syādubhayorapi dalayoḥ ṣaṣṭhagaṇo yatra jaḥ khakāro vā |
SA03n801:1788: pūrvārdhavacca śeṣaḥ pratiniyamo bhavati sā gītiḥ ||9 ||
SA03n801:1789: āryāyāṃ yatra ubhayorapi dalayoḥ ṣaṣṭhagaṇo jaḥ kho vā syāt,

SA03n801:1794: āryāyā yasyā ubhayorapi dalayoḥ ṣaṣṭhagaṇaḥ ko bhavati,
SA03n801:1795: śeṣaḥ yatyādipratiniyamaśca pūrvārdhe pañcamo'pi aparārdhavat syāt tāmupagītimāhuḥ |
SA03n801:1796: pūrvādhe ṣaṣṭhaḥ syātko yatra jakhau tu paścārdhe |
SA03n801:1797: śeṣaḥ pratiniyamo dalaviparyayād bhavati bhavati saṅgītiḥ ||11 ||
SA03n801:1798: yatra āryāyāḥ pūrvādhe ṣaṣṭhagaṇaḥ ko bhavatiḥ,
SA03n801:1799: paścārdhe ca jaḥ kho vā bhavati,

SA03n801:1820: asyāpi mukhe vaitālīyasamaṃ datrayaṃ dacatuṣkaṃ ca syātām ante bhaḥ gaḥ gaśca yatra syuḥ sā āpātalikā |
SA03n801:1822: yadi yugmapādayoḥ mukhe dātpare jadau bhavataḥ śeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca vaitālīyasamasānaṃ tadā prācyavṛttiḥ |
SA03n801:1824: yadi ayugmapādayoḥ mukhe jaḥ daśca staḥ śeṣaṃ ca vaitālīyasamānaṃ,
SA03n801:1827: ya udīcyavṛtte ayugmapādau āśritya prācyavṛtteḥ pādayugmaṃ ca syāt tat pravṛttakam |
